video.title: The Honourable Woman
video.synopsis: In this gripping Emmy-nominated miniseries, a baroness trying to forge new ties between Israelis and Palestinians stirs up international intrigue.

episodes.synopsis: Nessa Stein's foundation, which works for peace in the Middle East, grants a contract to a Palestinian man who is later found dead.
episodes.title: The Empty Chair

episodes.synopsis: Nessa has a liaison with her new bodyguard but realizes he's spying on her for MI6, and the hospitalized kidnapper receives a mysterious phone call.
episodes.title: The Unfaithful Husband

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious phone call gives Nessa a clue to the kidnappers' identity, and Nathaniel Bloom investigates the kidnapper who committed suicide.
episodes.title: The Killing Call

episodes.synopsis: A flashback to 2006 reveals Nessa's introduction to Atika and their first trip to Gaza, where they were held for ransom by Al-Zahid.
episodes.title: The Ribbon Cutter

episodes.synopsis: Nessa is sexually assaulted by her captors and becomes pregnant, events that have a ripple effect into the present day.
episodes.title: Two Hearts

episodes.synopsis: After he rescues Nessa during a sexual assault, Hayden-Hoyle reveals several secrets, including one that will cause a rift between her and Ephra.
episodes.title: The Mother Line

episodes.synopsis: Al-Zahid arrives in London to meet with Monica Chatwin, whom Hayden-Hoyle investigates. An attempt is made on Nessa's life.
episodes.title: The Hollow Wall

episodes.synopsis: As the United States prepares to recognize Palestine as a sovereign state, Hayden-Hoyle works behind the scenes to get Nessa to safety.
episodes.title: The Paring Knife
